msbt.message: It's a real nice day for sports. What's your favorite game, ?
Baseball.
Soccer.
Dodgeball.
Oh! Me too! Me and Grandpa would go to baseball games and he'd buy us popcorn, and ice creamAnd , and some , and even some !Then, while I was eating, he could watch the game! It was real fun!
I'm gonna tell you the truth about something, .I've never told nobody this, but I got no idea which one is soccer and which one is footballOr which one is the football that's also soccer.
I'm great at dodgeball! It doesn't matter how many times I get hit in the face, I never fall over!
On sunny days, the clouds look like cotton candy But how do ya think they taste on cloudy days?
Starchy.
Damp.
They're still sweet.
Starchy? OK, yeah. I guess they do look kinda like mashed potatoes. Would cloud potatoes need butter?Sometimes I use so much butter, Grandpa says, "Ya want some potatoes with your butter?!"
Damp? Eww! That's gross. I don't like soggy foods.Unless it's a stale cracker under the couch.<10_4 /> And I'm hungry. <10_4 />And lyin' on the floor.<10_4 /> And don't wanna move.
You think they'd still be sweet? Sure I can see that I want that, actually.I REALLY want the rainy clouds to be sweet, .Promise me they're sweet.
Sunny days put me in a singing mood. I bet this is how the birds feel too!
I saw some galoshes the other day and couldn't resist getting them.They're blueand shinyand real cool. Too cool to wear, ha! So I left them at home.
Ya gotta keep moving on cold days so ya don't freeze solid and get bit by the Snowsquatch.
I always thought rain was the sky crying because it's sad<10_4 />but Grandpa said I'm just a goofball.
Cloudy days can be downers<10_4 /> It's OK! Some days are downers! Ya gotta hold out for the sunny days!
It's so fun to play outside when it's sunny. Sometimes I even forget to go inside once the sun goes home!Heck! Sometimes I play so hard, I forget where I even live!
Didja know, ? The reason why it's bright at night is because the moon is a light bulb!
I meant to warn ya Don't play tag in the dark! The trees cheat!

Sometimes I'm outside and I forget when I went out there!I scream, "What am I doing outside? How'd I get out of my house? Am I a werewolf? <10_10 />DID I EAT ANYBODY?!"<10_9 />Of course I didn't eat anybody! I'd feel WAY more full than I do now!
The weather's nice today. I wonder if Mr. Sun is smiling? A huh huh!I'm not allowed to look at the sun!Not since"The Incident."
Last night I dreamed the moon didn't go to bed, so the sun was sad 'cause it couldn't get to work!What a dumb dream
I like to take naps outside under the warm sun, because my bed is inside and inside is too far.
It's sunny and a bug just said hi! That's pretty neat! Say hi to any bugs ya meet, !
Manit's wild how the sky and the clouds are different colors in different weather Justsowild
The sky's sooo pretty on sunny days. It's all blue. Like a blue-flavored ice plop. Yummy
With this many clouds in the sky, ya gotta wonder if they're even really clouds...Maybe they're really cotton candy, ya know?<10_4 /> Especially the long, straight clouds...
When it rains, the sky over the island is the color of Grandma's TV when the cable box is turned off
I like to say I'm chill, but there ain't nothing chill about this cold weather! Brrrrr!
What a nice morning, ! The skies are real clear!I hope it keeps up Maybe we'll see the meteor shower tonight!
If the weather stays this nice, it'll be a starry night tonight. We could see some meteors!I don't know what meteors are so I extra wanna see one!
Look up in the sky! What a big rainbow <10_4 />I wanna bite it!
! Didja see it?! DOUBLE RAINBOWS!I usually only ever see double things when I smack into a wall!
I'm so c-c-cold! If it don't warm up, the aurora-ra-ra might f-f-freeze!
Did ya see the aurora?!It was nutty! It was like somebody hung a curtain made of rainbows
Who's that?! Oh! It's you! Why's it so hard to see? I can't even find my own way home!
Whoa! Is the sky throwing a party? It's being all <10_10 />LOUD<10_9 /> and flashy!
Look at all those stars up there! They keep coming unglued from the ceiling and falling!Slow 'em down! They're so fast, I don't got time to make a wish!
Hey, . All the stars are out tonightlike pieces of rock just floating in space soup.Now I'm hungry for space soup and that's lame, 'cause I don't got a tall enough ladder to get some!
! Didja make your wish already?If you move  to look up when you see a shooting star, your wish comes true!I dunno what it means to "move ," but it sounds neat and I hope it works for ya!
